newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Yugang says in HK$213 mln equity issue.
newsitem.headline: Yugang says in HK$213 mln equity issue.

text.p: Yugang International Ltd said its controlling shareholder Chongqing Industrial Ltd would buy 73.2 million new Yugang shares at HK$2.95 each after it placed out the same amount of existing shares at the same price.
On completion of the transaction, Chongqing's stake in the company would be diluted to 52 percent from 60.70 percent, Yugang said in a statement.

Yugang said the net proceeds from the subscription of about HK$213 million would to be used to expand operation of its trading businesses in audio-visual products, industrial equipment, automobile parts and agricultural products.
Proceeds would also be used to further strengthen the company's cash flow position and for working capital, it said.
Yugang shares were up HK$0.10 to HK$3.325 at in early afternoon trade on Thursday.
